title: What are the Future Technology trends in automobile & Automotive industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: We may not yet have flying cars but we are on the verge of a technological revolution where manufacturers can rectify all the mistakes at the production stages and provide you with a safe ride. Internet of Things solutions in the automotive manufacturing offers user with the car, integrated with the sensors which detect any fault in the car. Manufacturers have already started to use virtual and augmented reality to optimize the flaws of the manufacturing process. But the most important trend would be Automotive Software Solutions. Onboard Detection Enterprise Fleet Management Solutions OEM Connected Solutions These are not just some fancy titles but solid trends that will be most anticipated in 2019. If you wish to learn more about these Automotive Industry Solutions then I suggest you read the blog Why Automotive Software Development is a Need of the Hour for the Manufacturing Industry?.
